subject: Re: [junit]
msgSnippet: There is a JUnit related site on http://junit.netbeans.org, you can find there useful info about Netbeans JUnit module. For the servlets testing see the online
messageBody:
There is a JUnit related site on http://junit.netbeans.org,
you can find there useful info about Netbeans JUnit module.

For the servlets testing see the online web site which has all
the information for using J2EEUnit and understanding how
it works : http://j2eeunit.sourceforge.net.

Vita

rejith wrote:

> Hi Everybody,
>
> Can somebody help me in integrating junit with Forte for java ?
> And should I have to write the test cases for all classes ?
> How can we test the servelets and all ?
>
> Regards
> Rejith
